description: Fun and festive, these delicious hot-chocolate stir sticks will delight family and friends this holiday season when added to a mug of warmed milk.
name: Hotchocolate Stir Sticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease 8 holes of a 1tbs-capacity silicon base ice-cube tray with oil. Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on medium for 2 minutes, stirring with a metal spoon halfway through or until melted and smooth. Set aside for 2 minutes to cool slightly.
Spoon chocolate into greased icecube tray holes until 3/4 full. Refrigerate for 10 minutes or until partially set.
Insert sticks into the centre of each chocolate and sprinkle with a few marshmallows and Caramilk chips. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until set.
Carefully remove chocolates from ice cube tray. Serve.
